values:
In life, if your truly Sad, no amount of money will fix that.  Sadness transcends wealth and success.  In the end, things don't always get better, sometimes you just have to deal with it.  You have to face life the way that it has turned out for you and deal with it.  Dwelling won't help(despite what Heidegger says!)  If you want to transcend Sadness, then you must first rise above the material.  Materiality will only get you so far.  Understanding that money is not an end is the first step in this process.  I had come to that conclusion a long time ago.  When I switched majors from Computer Engineering to Philosophy I had decided that money was simply a means.  And now, with large sums of money staring me in the face, just waiting to be taken, I understand that even more so then before.  In life, if you are truly Sad, no amount of money will fix that.  It is better to have mental riches than physical riches.  A lot of people will probably respond with something along the lines of "If I was upset and I got a million dollars, I'd feel much better."  Do you really think that?  I've said that before too, but do you really think that?  It sounds sappy and cliche, but will your money save you from a life of lonliness, heartache?  No.  Maybe it masks symptoms of Sadness, but anyone who is truly in sync with themselves can see thru that.  Money is just material, and humans are so much more than that.


In relationships there should be a certain amount of dissent.  No relationships are perfect.  Two imperfect beings can not create something perfect.  True love is wanting to fix any problems that arise, and actually doing it.  If there are no problems in a relationship then there are a few things that could be happening.  One or more parties involved may be totally dumb.  Most people have opinions on things and are willing to stand up for what they believe, if not, then your dumb.  And most sets of two people wont agree on everything in the world and this will lead to dissent.  Or the person might not have an opinion on anything, and in that case their dull.  Dull people are not worth being around.  It is the wanting and the fixing that makes love what it is.  If two people always say they love one another, and no problems never arose, then I would call them liars.  To me without the test there is no proof.(Take that Dr. Schwartz!)  I would rather be with the person I've gone with hard times with and succeeded then the one thats never had any problems, because theres no gaurentee then when problems arise you will be able to overcome them.  

But of course, I dont expect anyone to agree.  This is only my personal philosophy that has sprung from my mind that has gone through my life events.  And none of you have my mind or my life so you might not have any idea where I'm coming from.  But that is ok, I've become slightly more tolerant of other peoples opinions as of late and now I tend to only ridicule them in my head.  Unless your trying to talk about God, but I digress, back to the topic at hand.  

What is the topic again?  Life.  This is all life.  An ontological study of me.  What it is to be me.  Does anyone care?  I do.  You shouldn't, but I do.  

Ah life.  The great cosmic accident.  We could just as easily not be here.  But we are, so what do we do?  It would be so much easier if essence preceded existence.  Imagine what it's like to be a chair.  What do chairs do?  They just sit there(ironically).  Whoever invented the chair, made it with its use and purpose in mind.  Where does that leave us creatures that just came into existence?  That leaves us in an amazing position.  We get to create our own reason for being, and that is beautiful.  What do you exist for?  Do you know?  Have you ever thought about it?  It doesnt have to be the same forever, it can change at anytime.  It is ours to control.  At the moment I live for another being.  Making that being happy means everything to me, and in the end that makes me happy.  And in my eyes there is no greater good than my own happiness(props to john stuart mill).  Selfish, maybe.  It's who I am at this point in time.  Thats not to say the greater good doesnt ever come to my mind, but often times the greater good in the long run is better for me, than any immediate satisfaction.

This is all I have to say for now.

An addict to what you may ask.  Emotion.  Believe it or not this despite my crusade for logic and reason, sometimes I get caught up in my emotions.  And by sometimes I mean a lot.  If I'm happy, then I am HAPPY.  If I am sad...well thats when the feelings of hate, jealousy, and pity all rear their ugly heasd.  Despite my best efforts to be reasonable, I get caught up in the real world sometimes, and it hurts.  I love two people in this world more than anything, but now that number is down to one.  Sheri made me feel more than anyone else, she was the "wind beneath my wings."  What do birds do when there's no more wind?  They have to fly on their own, or fall.  I don't want to fall.  The truth is, I want my wind back.  More than anything.  I don't see that happening, and I'm not going to force anything to happen.  This whole thing has really upset.  No matter how tough on the outside I seem...I am broken.  

I think I need some change.  Change is good right?  I'm thinking about doing something some might say is "very drastic."  I need to move, but I dont know if I can do that the way things are right now.  I need to leave this life behind.  How ironic.  

Without you, Sherilyn Fitzgerald, it's not as much fun to pick up the pieces.  No matter where I am, I will always love you.

~Patient~

People tell me I'm alive,
but I just don't feel it.
I'm on top of the world,
but something is different.
This thing I've become,
so empty and naked.

I'm not myself,
I'm hardly anyone at all.

It's a sickness inside,
you just can't see it.
I'd betray myself,
before anyone could see,
this thing I've become.
I'm alone and hating.

I'm not myself,
I'm hardly anyone at all.

Now everything is black.
I wade through broken glass.
I rip the shards from my back.
I stand with hope, I stand with hate.
I hope you'll come down.
Come down for me.

You can say that it's over,
but I won't believe it.
I won't stand alone.
Like that makes any difference.
This thing I've become,
is so sad and lonely.

Because;

No matter what I wrote,
I wrote for you.
No matter what I said,
I thought of you.


Now everything is black.
I wade through broken glass.
I rip the shards from my back.
I stand with hope, I stand with hate.
I hope you'll come down.
Come down.

Come down for me.

I live in Charlestown, not Charleston...Three people posted an entry about last night, and everyone one of you spelt it wrong... FOR SHAME!

ps.  michelle that song i was trying to think of was called "here comes the sun"

What's coming through is alive.
What's holding up is a mirror.
But what's singing songs is a snake
Looking to turn this piss to wine.

They're both totally void of hate,
But killing me just the same.

The snake behind me hisses
What my damage could have been.
My blood before me begs me
Open up my heart again.

And I feel this coming over like a storm again.
Considerately.

Venomous voice, tempts me,
Drains me, bleeds me,
Leaves me cracked and empty.
Drags me down like some sweet gravity.

The snake behind me hisses
What my damage could have been.
My blood before me begs me
Open up my heart again.

And I feel this coming over like a storm again.

I am too connected to you to
Slip away, to fade away.
Days away I still feel you
Touching me, changing me,
And considerately killing me.

Without the skin,
Beneath the storm,
Under these tears
The walls came down.

And the snake is drowned and
As I look in his eyes,
My fear begins to fade
Recalling all of those times.

I could have cried then.
I should have cried then.

And as the walls come down and
As I look in your eyes
My fear begins to fade
Recalling all of the times
I have died
and will die.
It's all right.
I don't mind.

I am too connected to you to
Slip away, to fade away.
Days away I still feel you
Touching me, changing me,

And considerately killing me.

You scored as Scar. You BAD little person - You're Scar! You are extremely egotistical and ALWAYS right, and you DARE anyone to say otherwise. You see weaknesses in people and have a tendency to exploit them for your own gain, or just your sick pleasure. You are very proud, haughty and arrogant, and you believe investing "emotionally" with anyone is a waste of time. You like being 'in the know' and aware of your surroundings, in case your concocted plans of villany go awry. You're never caught with your pants down - you can talk your way out of anything. Better watch your back, though... you never know what could come back to bite ya in the rear.

...doomed to crumble, the less we grow.

How true.

So i have ordered more drum stuff, bringing the grand total too....WAY TO MUCH FUCKING MONEY.

Hopefully i can stop being a spend-a-holic.

I havent really written in this for a long time.  Writers block?  Maybe.  Lack of anything to say?  Perhaps.  No inspiration?  Definetly.

Life has become an endless cycle of working.  No matter what I do I feel like its work.  I take pleasure in very little nowadays.  Seasonal depression?  Shouldn't it help me to write sad/angry/depressing things?

Guess not.

Caitlin ElizAbeth has called me a few times in the past week...very wierd circumstances.  I just don't know anymore.  

I think it's possible for people to become so emotionally detatched, that they literally don't give a shit about anything, even "loved" ones.  What the fuck is love.  And who the hell can define it?  No one.  And if you say you can, I gaurentee a million people disagree with you.  It's bullshit.  

Do I sound unhappy?  Cuz I'm not.  I just don't care anymore, I don't have any drive.  I'm comatose.  You can't feel in a coma, can you?

I need a revelation...some sort of awakening that shows me why I need to wake up in the morning. 

I want something new and different in my life, not this same old boring crap...I think I need friends...friends that live down here and that I can actually see so that I dont have to drive to warwick anytime I want to hang out with someone. Moving out here is one of THE crappiest things to happen in my life.  

I mean I have goals and ambitions with my philosophy and all of that, but that isnt a reason for me to get up, its just what i figure i will do when i get up.  

I want to wake up in the morning and be like YES TODAY IM GOING TO ____________!!!!!!

every morning i wake up....i go back to sleep.

People dont invite me to do things...they really never have...i have never gotten a phone call that went "Hey nick we are going to do this, want to join us?"  In fact, as long as i can remember, the only person that calls me is sheri.  i wonder why.  am i just out of the loop?  am i not interesting enough?  do people just not think of it?  even dylan doesnt invite me to go do things, he has new entire groups of friends, ive never met...do i give off some sort of leave me alone vibe?  i love to be in small groups, but not alone.

the only plans i ever have are A) I corner dylan into saying hes not doing anything and i drive to see him  B) thursday nights when i go to see michelle and jen(it should be stated here that michelle has driven to see me also)  C) With sheri...which not that i dont like her cuz i obviously do but...it gets booooooring....

Heres a list of people that have ever driven to my house more than once:

Dylan
Sheri
Michelle

I'm sure theres good reasons for it, i just wonder what they are.

i sort of miss high school...the days when everyday i saw a ton of people, whether i liked them or not, i saw a big group of people.

I miss a lot of people sitting down here, 20(if your at uri) or 40(if your in warwick) miles away...

maybe i make too much out of this...for the most part you could easily say its because i dont really put effort behind it either, and when i do put effort behind it(to see michelle and jen and dylan and sheri) then it actually gets done...i just dont want to feel like i force myself there...

ive been in bryan and matts room twice this year, once with each of them, and each time i felt kinda weird, out of place, like they felt uncomfortable....i dunno, maybe im just retarded and am not open enough....

or maybe all these people dont really have time for me, maybe they have busy lives.

this is an interesting debate that could go on in my head for hours, but for the sake of my fingers i think i ll move on.

eh this is all i have for now, i was hoping if i just sat down and typed id come up with inspiration to write something , but it hasnt happened. 

plllllllllll.


the end.

You will conquer the entire earth using manipulation and an iron fist. Mankind is merely a pawn to you, something to use and to abuse. You will lead the dark armies through hell's gates and onto earth to fight the last battle between good and evil. now the whole world knows.

I was walking around URI today and i just started to think...after walking around for an hour i decided to sit and write so i wrote a lot of what i had been thinking...

Will i ever find lasting peace?  Inner peace.  A calm that not only flows inside but out; onto everyone else.  It can be seen by all.  Momentary peace is simple; useless.  The emptying of thoughts, reflection on that in your life which is good.  How do you extend that peace?  can you do it by days?  years?

i get these pains.  its a slight pressure in the back of my head.  it feels like my brain is saying "thats it, ive had it, im out of here."  and he just keeps banging away trying to get out.  Have you ever felt like your brain was trying to escape you?  will i ever find inner peace?

over 19 years i've had this pain 9 times.  4 times over the first 18 years and 5 in the last month.  and now its growing.  my temples throb, i get this insatiable urge to shut it out.  but i never can.

wandering is the only useful way to travel.  just wandering; aimlessly at first.  then you realize that nothing is aimless and that the aim of wandering is to absorb.  you ll discover amazing things.  when you wander you must walk slower, breath slower, think slower.  now look...everyone looks like they are going in fast forward.  you and the world can laugh as you wander.

if life was a race would i be winning or losing?  i dont understand the concept of failure.  if you fail; you've already found one way to not do something.  or youve realized that you dont know enough, and can go learn.  failure can open just as many doors as success.

ok i gotta go i ll elongate later i did the labeling part fast, i mighta screwd up but i really need to leave if you notice a huge error tell me, if not im sure i ll pick it up later anyway.

work work work; read read read; all i've been doing lately, fuck school and work, i want to lie around and be a lazy bum.  mine and dylans schedule are just way to conflicting to ever get a practice, he has to pick his sister up at school everyday at  like 2 and i work almost every weekend....but i did get to jam with jen recently, that was interesting and fun.  i cant stop coughing:(  fuck this, why am i even updating this.

got my 13" paiste signature dark crisp hats
and a 22" aax metal ride...

now im working on refinishing the kit....ive taken the wraps off the two mounted toms(and only gashed my finger open once)...now i just gotta take the wrap off the floor tom, do lots of sanding stain and lacquer...then my set will be beautiful....that and i want to replace my snare and i need new stands for my snare and hi hats...and id like a new crash...that is all.

The agony of defeat....being so close to that breaking point, but then having the rug pulled out from under you and becoming lost in the way things move...i wish i had an angry inch...i really wish i had things more that were more concrete, less like jello....its like always trying to eat but people keep stealing my silverware....a big yellow bus just went roaring by, and the sky is cloudy but not falling, for once.  however there is a storm afoot and i will not settle till all the sandbags are out, armed and ready....we will attack anything with full force, or full frontal nudity, which ever we see fit.  tommorow is just another day, and "see you tommorow" is just another way to say "get the fuck out of my life."  What rich context, yet poor timing.  my ego is bigger than yours, and my id is taking over....as if it hadnt already.  i dont like you, i like to fuck you...i like to fuck....i like to fuck with you...i dont like you...

thank god school starts soon, im tired of working 40 hours a week.  sheris birthday is soon i have a few days off for that, i still need to buy her stuff, i have like $400 that should be plenty.  then after that i need to buy new hi hats, then recording equipment.  me and dylan have started doing a lot more work, leah didnt show up to our last scheduled practice nor did she call.  any reliable vocalists or guitarists out there want to jam with us sometime?  you dont have to be great, cuz we arent, but we do take it seriously.  Feel free to email at worthlessliar7@hotmail.com if you interested or want any information.  

we have about 6 nearly completed songs.  We only need a vocalist to help us get a feel for how they sound so we can fine tune everything.  if i can ill try to get some sound clips of me and dylan playing our songs up here, but unless we've gotten better recording equipment it will just be the guitar and drums parts cuz dylan cant play bass and guitar at the same time(bastard!)  or maybe we will record drums and bass, which ever way makes the song sound better, some are more bass oriented some guitar.   anyway........

thats all i really got say, band and work is my life right now.

I ordered a new ride from a music shop in warwick.  it's a sabian 21" hh raw bell dry ride.  http://www.musiciansfriend.com/srs7/sid=040803100039068009206011028277/g=perc/g=perc/search/bigpid/base_id/50703/   That's it right there.  I got it for 240.  I still need new hi hats and im very confused about which ones to get.  They are much more difficult to choose:(

I have work soon.  This friday I'll be making a $400 deposit into the bank, bringing the grand total over $500...which means it will be time to start shopping for new hi hats and stands.  mmmmmm.  ozzfest was pretty good...it really just made me want to play and practice more.  I finished watching the first season of queer as folk and am a little into season two.  i cried twice watching it last night, the end of season one was reeeeally sad, so i hope theres more funny stuff on its way.  and more of emmett, you just cant get enough emmett.

WARNING: If you don't care what I think about at 4 a.m. after nights of not sleeping, than please leave.  This is just a random excerpt from my notebook from a few days ago.  I occasionaly find my thoughts interesting and wish to share them, if you wish to read than enjoy, if not than thank you and have a nice die.(i hope you die)

Imagination.  Sometimes its too real to ignore.  Sometimes its to great to ignore.  My life is slowly turning into my imagination.  My reality is nothing bu duldrums in the Sea of Unrest.  Reality does in fact bite.  Casual sex, casual drugs, casual life.  Live when you feel like it.  Die when you don't.  Heaven is our own personal utopia, there is no God or supreme being.  Hell is full of fear, wants, and needs.  Hell the is real world.  But fear not, because there is a solution.  The mind can often times create images, ideas, etc. in such real ways, that the reality of the situation is, we don't know what is real and what isn't.  My fantasies have become so perfect, so me, that I can't help but constantly wander into them.  The whole idea seems crazy.  In fact, I'm sure it'd be a good definition of of crazy.  When one cannot tell fact from fantasy.  But this is such a subliminal state.  No one in that situation would ever call themselves crazy.  They are perfectly sane, they are choosing eternal bliss in a world full of shit.  Ignorance=bliss.  A man locked up in a padded room thinks he is really an American under cover agent trying to topple communists in Russia.  It's what he has always wanted to be, a great spy.  And now he is.  Is it better to know, or think you know?  It's an unanswerable question because no one can see both sides equally.  No one can see the beauty that each must offer.  I used to think badly of ignorance.  I used to think true, factual, provable knowledge was everything.  Am I being a hypocrite?  Do I want knowledge or happiness?  I used to think I could have both.  Then I realized, I either know the truth of the situation or the situation makes me happy.  Either or, never both.  The whole thing is mental suicide.
         You can't have imagination and knowledge.  Knowledge puts an end to daydreams.  Frued said something about it in a book I have.  Children(who would be considered unknowledgable) daydream, while adults(the knowledgable) do not.  They are made to think it evil.  When in fact they couldn't be farther from the truth.  My daydreaming, my thoughts make me happier(therefore not evil) than anything.  My imagination world is continuously making it harder for me to coexist in this real world.  My days are distracted by thoughts and visions, my nights are intolerable.  I don't sleep.  My mind sits and processes thousands of thoughts and hundreds of dreams, and if I'm lucky enough to fall asleep for long enough to enter that deep sleep/dream state, I can then see my dreams come ever more to life.  How sick am I?
         This has a lot to do with my "I Wish I Was Locked in a Small White Room" peom I wrote a while ago.  I can never put anything into words.  Everything I see, do, experience, think, or just pass by.  It's all lost forever.  I have neither the ability or intelligence to record it properly.  How can I change that?  It's 4 am and my vision is blurry.  The moth that was flying around me lap is gone.  It was white.  It was beautiful.  Beautifully ignorant in this hell infested universe.  I have little more to talk about now.

so yea i waited till i had lots to say and lots i needed to remember for my post here, and here it is.

Ok, i got a job(finally, there are NO jobs in westerly) at blockbuster. its 7 an hour and i work like 20 hours a week so far.  that's more than a hundred dollars a week which is good cuz heres my list of things i need to buy in order:

New snares...as many strands as possible 42 if i can get it in the offset feature...if not i ll get the biggest offset one i can get.(anythings better than my crappy ass 12)  $10-15

new sticks...i want to try 2B's, i want to try some 7A's and i want to try some Sigs.  $50 ish

Double tom holder...so i dont need to mount them on my bass drum  $150

New Cymbals...definetly a new ride and new hi hats, if i end up with a pack maybe another crash...i'd also like to add a wuhan china...for these i need to hit p guitar center and spend a while playing around(note to self: try the paiste802's and the paiste alphas, try the sabian AAX, try meinl if they have(the rapid decay china), other chinas(or crash, i want something with no sustain)also try the paiste sigs, and the zildjian k customs)  $200 for ride  $200 for hats  $10 for china $150 for crash 

silencers...because i want them  $80

Stands...every cymbal i buy will need a stand or mount, depending on the number of cymbals  $200-$300

cowbell...just for variety $20

bass head...really could use a new bass head, maybe a new hoop also.  $60

snare...preferably the chad smith Pearl sig, but will try others. $200

MR8...only need 150 for this, ill probably split with dylan so we can record.

then finally!  i want to re finish my drums, im gonna pull the silver off and probably give it a natural wood finish...cost unknown


total(with me being very lenient):  $1310 ... more than 4 times the amount i spent on my orignal set, and brings my grand total of drumming purchases to a whooping $2300...and at $100 a week it will take me 13 weeks, thats a little more than 3 months...that should keep me set for at least year, then maybe more, or replacement cymbals, and ill def. need new heads and sticks...then maybe in a few years a new kit.

now with that out of the way you might ask is it worth it?  is your band going anywhere?  The answers are: yes. and  Not right now, but we're getting there. we have enough orignals for a demo, a few are closed to finished and a few arent...we are working on a few covers.

Outline of songs

song 1- has no words, the music is totally done...we want to spice it up, but its still done, and we can play with all the way through

This is because of you- all the words, all the guitar and bass, no drums yet im having a hell of a time with this one...will possibly leave it as pure acoustic, because we like it that way.

Cross eyed- has all the words, has all the bass and drums, perefectly done...no guitar...me and dylan can play it through no problem

song 4- this has an intro and a verse on all instruments...no chorus/bridge or breakdown(that i can remember) ...and no words

song  5- this is kind of a peppy song in comparison to the rest of ours, so far it has me and dylan (everything but a breakdown and structure) we still need leah and words.

Covers

Fight song by MM- we've all been practicing, havent played it together
Nobodies by MM- we've played it together, havent locked in yet.
lamb of god by MM- i dont think any of us have started it yet, but its not too hard.

yea lots of mariyln manson huh?  well me and dylan like it so plll...plus he fits our style i think, esp. lamb of god and nobodies...cuz i dunno we seem to write kinda heavy songs, but they tend to sound slow and sad...

We could really use a singer, it would help TONS...but we dont want to get someone thats all been in a band before and is like awesome cuz we dont really practice enough...i think we'd be best off with someone who sounds decent and just wants to do it for shits and giggles, since thats pretty much what we seem to be about...leah also wants another guitarist, i would like one so that we always can have a guitarist on hand, and cuz leah has a REALLY hard time writing stuff(sorry but you do), hopefully with the tape she has of all our recordings it makes it easier for her...it helped me a lot.

^^^^if anyones interested to try for those parts call me...315-2040...thats my house dont call my cell after june 26th its getting canceled, i hate cell phones.  or you could leave a comment, you could stop by for a practice, we practice in warwick now so its not 50 minutes away(used to play at my house) so you can stop by and listen if you like what you hear, you can try, if not then no harm done...we do everything the the band by a unanimous vote, but we'll need to discuss, so we 'll let you know asap  (REMEMBER: we are NOT great musicians but we try and have fun thats what its about...and for the singer you dont need to be able to write lyrics...iv written them so far for the songs we have words too and am working on others, it would be great if you did, but dont worry if you dont)

anyway beyond this band...all the equipment will help me better my self and improve my own abilities which will help this band, and any other one in the future...BTW we once again have a name....its Ig Alboc...we wanted something that meant something to us and wasnt just nonsense...but dont bother asking about it we took a vow silence.

im not a depressed person.  really im not.  when you see me im probably smiling and happy and laughing and having a good time.  I dont fake it.  but im human and like everyone else so i get mad sometimes.  and i write things that make me sound sad, when in the end it makes me happy.  and on a side note i mention this cuz my dad brought it up.  i dress in all black, because im very self concious about what i wear, and its one of the only colors i feel good in, i feel like i look good in black, most other colors make me feel uncomfortable.  and i think i look bad.  its not my fashion statement, its the only 'style' i like on my body.  

"only one thing makes me happy, and its not what i get from you."

what an ironic gift that was.  (dont worry no one is suppose to understand that.)


i think most man are an island unto themselves, but i seem to be a planet.  both positionaly and as a matter of size, my ambitions are big(read: i have delusions of granduer)

i love you.  i love you.  and i love you.  oh yea and i love you.  i love you all.  unfortunatly(or fortuantly) love means nothing to me anymore, because to those i love it means nothing.  ( thats aimed at about 18 different people)  

i dont even know what i think it is anymore, but i dont like it.  the problem is i become to attached to everything and everyONE.  and i dont know what i actually feel, i dont know what it should feel like.  i've been in nonstop relationships for like 4 years.  my life always revolved around someone else, and now theres no one.  whether they believed it or not, my life was always very girlfriend-centric.  thats how i have to be.  i cant honestly revolve around myself, because i dont know what to do.  

maybe alone is what i need, to grow into me.  wait i cant do that with my dad breathing down my neck about every decision i make in life, and the fact that its wrong.  i dont WANT anybody.  i NEED somebody.  and its sad.  it really is.


more than anything right now, i want leah to open up to me and be like a best friend i never had or to date have.  because together we could do great things( intellectually and  NOT sexually, this isnt me lusting after her)

and that last part might make some of you think of dylan.  dylan was your best friend wasnt he?  well no i dont think so, and i dont mean it insultingly, let me explain why.

i always felt one of us was doing something wrong.  at first(read: till last year)  we never opened up at all, 0, ziltch, nada.  but then the day came that i told him i liked guys, i think that was when i began to tell him things, open up with more things(maybe it had to do with going to a phsyc. for the first time?)  but yea, he was there and he listend.  but to date he has never come to me with a problem.  i dont think HE sees us as a 'best-friend' unit.  i dont know why.  but i wont doubt that he has always been there for me and always will be.

but in all seriousness i dont think i trusthim 100% with everything.  

1 person in this world knows me through an through, she knows everything iv done, and why or why not, she knows what i plan, she helps me see things clearly, shes the only person that knows this entire intricate set of lies that my life is built on.  she may not know all the past details of things i will tell her, but that comes with time ya know.  this paragraph is dedicated to michelle pugh.  i trust her more than anyone.  to everyone else, that means that yes, iv lied to you/are lying to you/will lie to you when and how it suits my needs.  i am a bad person.  i dont try to hurt people, i just try to make everything the best possible situation for me.  (not too good at it am i?)  

ive become insatiable, everything i get is only half of what i want  and this has become to long so im posting it.

I'll change on my own forget the word on the street.

Recall the moments that i make you smile just because,
and that's where i'll be,
with my crooked halo above.
I'll trade you halos,
when you deserve, a lot more.

I want to forget that I exist.
I want to go home,
take two aspirin,
snort 2 lines,
smoke 2 joints,
and never call you again.
I want you to forget I exist.
I want to break even.
Live day by day,
die minute by minute,
and lose myself.
I want to forget that I exist.
Find a dead end job,
stick to meaningless relationships,
so I'll always have a reason to complain.
I always think that every moment that passes can't possibly be worst than the last and every moment I am wrong.
My life is already over.
But I still think, therefore I still am.
If I don't think,
then I am not.
I am not.
I am not.
I am not... you.
I am...
not...
you...

I want to forget that I exist.

I forgot.
I forgot about you.
And I forgot that I exist.
